BackstoryDef.title: M-Series Drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assembled, seemingly, by archotechs long ago, no knowledge of this units origin or purpose remains. It certainly only seems built for warfare, though. What use could Archotechs have had for this?

BackstoryDef.title: Drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Drone "childhoods" are as interesting as they are often forgotten. Many creators don't bother marking the moment of awakening, and no drone knows its own history.

BackstoryDef.title: Fresh Blank
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was created to be a perfectly blank slate, ready for its next owner to form its first and only memories with.

BackstoryDef.title: War Drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a drone that has only ever been capable of warfighting. Bugs, mechanoids, rebels, empires, none of it matters. Drones don't care who they fight, and they don't remember who they've killed.

BackstoryDef.title: Drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a drone that continues to serve based on its programming. There's no way of knowing how many times that programming has changed, but the drone does not seem bothered by this.

BackstoryDef.title: Adult Blank
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: This unit has neither intelligence nor memory. It is entirely devoid of character and utility.
